content: stars hollow hat keenan bulky 106 yds 1 hank size 10 6 0 mm 16 circulars bor st marker 10 st markers optional for decreases gauge 15 5 sts x 23 row in st st= 4 size approx beanie 16 circumference x 8 tall unstretched to fit an adult head slouch 16 circumference x 9 deep unstretched to fit an adult head stars hollow hat is inspired by the show gilmore girls this basic hat pattern is perfect to showcase the beautiful hand dyed yarn this pattern is great for novice knitters as well seasoned knitters pattern using german twisted cast on co 66 sts join in the round being careful not to twist place bor marker ribbing round *k1tbl p1* repeat around repeat ribbing round for a total of 8 rounds body round knit 1 round repeat body round until hat measures 7 5 from co for a beanie or 9 from co for a slouch hat crown of hat it may be beneficial to place st markers every 6 sts for decrease rounds this will aid in counting round 1 *k4 k2tog* repeat around 55 sts round 6 k round 2 k round 7 *k1 k2tog* repeat around 22 sts round 3 *k3 k2tog* repeat around 44 sts round 8 k round 4 k round 9 *k2tog* repeat around 11 sts round 5 *k2 k2tog* repeat around 33 sts cut yarn leaving a 10 tail pull tail through remaining sts 2 xs weave in ends abbreviations bor = beginning of round m = marker sts = stitches co = cast on p = purl st st = stockinette stitch k = knit repeat = repeat xs = times k2tog = knit 2 stitches together st = stitch this pattern is for personal use only not for resale ©2024 unwind yarn shop llc all rights reserved 9912 e grand river brighton mi 810-229-5579 www unwindyarnshopmi com
